courses.title: Web Development Fundamentals
courses.description: Introduction to HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics for building modern websites.

courses.title: Advanced JavaScript
courses.description: Deep dive into modern JavaScript including ES6+, async programming, and design patterns.

courses.title: Database Systems
courses.description: Comprehensive study of relational databases, SQL, and database design principles.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Principles
courses.description: Learn user interface and experience design methodologies for creating intuitive applications.

courses.title: React Framework
courses.description: Build modern single-page applications using React.js and its ecosystem.

courses.title: DevOps Fundamentals
courses.description: Introduction to DevOps practices including CI/CD, containerization, and cloud deployment.

courses.title: Capstone Project
courses.description: Final project demonstrating comprehensive skills acquired throughout the program.
